title: ng generate
contents:
mode_edit code
CLI

ng generatelink

Generates and/or modifies files based on a schematic.

ng generate <schematic> [options] ng g <schematic> [options]

Arguments

Argument Description
<schematic>

The schematic or collection:schematic to generate.

This option can take one of the following sub-commands:

  • appShell
  • application
  • class
  • component
  • directive
  • enum
  • guard
  • interface
  • library
  • module
  • pipe
  • service
  • serviceWorker
  • universal

Options

Option Description
--defaults=true|false

When true, disables interactive input prompts for options with a default.

Default: false
--dryRun=true|false

When true, run through and report activity without writing out results.

Default: false

Aliases: -d
--force=true|false

When true, force overwriting of existing files.

Default: false

Aliases: -f
--help=
true|false|json|JSON

Shows a help message for this command in the console.

Default: false
--interactive=true|false

When false, disables interactive input prompts.

Default: false

Schematic commandslink

appShelllink

ng generate appShell [options] ng g appShell [options]

Options

Option Description
--appDir=appDir

The name of the application directory.

Default: app
--appId=appId

The appId to use withServerTransition.

Default: serverApp
--clientProject=clientProject

Name of related client app.
--index=index

Name of the index file

Default: index.html
--main=main

The name of the main entry-point file.

Default: main.server.ts
--name=name

Name of the universal app
--outDir=outDir

The output directory for build results.

Default: dist-server
--root=root

The root directory of the app.

Default: src
--rootModuleClassName=
rootModuleClassName

The name of the root module class.

Default: AppServerModule
--rootModuleFileName=
rootModuleFileName

The name of the root module file

Default: app.server.module.ts
--route=route

Route path used to produce the app shell.

Default: shell
--sourceDir=sourceDir

The path of the source directory.

Default: src

Aliases: -D
--test=test

The name of the test entry-point file.
--testTsconfigFileName=
testTsconfigFileName

The name of the TypeScript configuration file for tests.

Default: tsconfig.spec
--tsconfigFileName=
tsconfigFileName

The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

Default: tsconfig.server
--universalProject=
universalProject

Name of related universal app.

applicationlink

ng generate application <name> [options] ng g application <name> [options]

Arguments

Argument Description
<name>

The name of the application.

Options

Option Description
--experimentalIvy=true|false

EXPERIMENTAL: Specifies whether to create a new application which uses the Ivy rendering engine.

Default: false
--inlineStyle=true|false

Specifies if the style will be in the ts file.

Default: false

Aliases: -s
--inlineTemplate=true|false

Specifies if the template will be in the ts file.

Default: false

Aliases: -t
--minimal=true|false

Create a barebones project without any testing frameworks

Default: false
--prefix=prefix

The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

Default: app

Aliases: -p
--routing=true|false

Generates a routing module.

Default: false
--skipPackageJson=true|false

Do not add dependencies to package.json.

Default: false
--skipTests=true|false

Skip creating spec files.

Default: false

Aliases: -S
--style=style

The file extension to be used for style files.

Default: css
--viewEncapsulation=
Emulated|Native|None|ShadowDom

Specifies the view encapsulation strategy.

classlink

ng generate class <name> [options] ng g class <name> [options]

Arguments

Argument Description
<name>

The name of the class.

Options

Option Description
--project=project

The name of the project.
--spec=true|false

Specifies if a spec file is generated.

Default: false
--type=type

Specifies the type of class.

Default:

componentlink

ng generate component <name> [options] ng g component <name> [options]

Arguments

Argument Description
<name>

The name of the component.

Options

Option Description
--changeDetection=Default|OnPush

Specifies the change detection strategy.

Default: Default

Aliases: -c
--entryComponent=true|false

Specifies if the component is an entry component of declaring module.

Default: false
--export=true|false

Specifies if declaring module exports the component.

Default: false
--flat=true|false

Flag to indicate if a dir is created.

Default: false
--inlineStyle=true|false

Specifies if the style will be in the ts file.

Default: false

Aliases: -s
--inlineTemplate=true|false

Specifies if the template will be in the ts file.

Default: false

Aliases: -t
--lintFix=true|false

Specifies whether to apply lint fixes after generating the component.

Default: false
--module=module

Allows specification of the declaring module.

Aliases: -m
--prefix=prefix

The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

Aliases: -p
--project=project

The name of the project.
--selector=selector

The selector to use for the component.
--skipImport=true|false

Flag to skip the module import.

Default: false
--spec=true|false

Specifies if a spec file is generated.

Default: true
--styleext=styleext

The file extension to be used for style files.

Default: css
--viewEncapsulation=
Emulated|Native|None|ShadowDom

Specifies the view encapsulation strategy.

Aliases: -v

directivelink

ng generate directive <name> [options] ng g directive <name> [options]

Arguments

Argument Description
<name>

The name of the directive.

Options

Option Description
--export=true|false

Specifies if declaring module exports the directive.

Default: false
--flat=true|false

Flag to indicate if a dir is created.

Default: true
--lintFix=true|false

Specifies whether to apply lint fixes after generating the directive.

Default: false
--module=module

Allows specification of the declaring module.

Aliases: -m
--prefix=prefix

The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

Aliases: -p
--project=project

The name of the project.
--selector=selector

The selector to use for the directive.
--skipImport=true|false

Flag to skip the module import.

Default: false
--spec=true|false

Specifies if a spec file is generated.

Default: true

enumlink

ng generate enum <name> [options] ng g enum <name> [options]

Arguments

Argument Description
<name>

The name of the enum.

Options

Option Description
--lintFix=true|false

Specifies whether to apply lint fixes after generating the enum.

Default: false
--project=project

The name of the project.

guardlink

ng generate guard <name> [options] ng g guard <name> [options]

Arguments

Argument Description
<name>

The name of the guard.

Options

Option Description
--flat=true|false

Flag to indicate if a dir is created.

Default: true
--lintFix=true|false

Specifies whether to apply lint fixes after generating the guard.

Default: false
--project=project

The name of the project.
--spec=true|false

Specifies if a spec file is generated.

Default: true

interfacelink

ng generate interface <name> <type> [options] ng g interface <name> <type> [options]

Arguments

Argument Description
<name>

The name of the interface.
<type>

Specifies the type of interface.

Options

Option Description
--lintFix=true|false

Specifies whether to apply lint fixes after generating the directive.

Default: false
--prefix=prefix

Specifies the prefix to use.

Default:

--project=project

The name of the project.

librarylink

ng generate library <name> [options] ng g library <name> [options]

Arguments

Argument Description
<name>

The name of the library.

Options

Option Description
--entryFile=entryFile

The path to create the library's public API file.

Default: public_api
--prefix=prefix

The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

Default: lib

Aliases: -p
--skipInstall=true|false

Skip installing dependency packages.

Default: false
--skipPackageJson=true|false

Do not add dependencies to package.json.

Default: false
--skipTsConfig=true|false

Do not update tsconfig.json for development experience.

Default: false

modulelink

ng generate module <name> [options] ng g module <name> [options]

Arguments

Argument Description
<name>

The name of the module.

Options

Option Description
--flat=true|false

Flag to indicate if a dir is created.

Default: false
--module=module

Allows specification of the declaring module.

Aliases: -m
--project=project

The name of the project.
--routing=true|false

Generates a routing module.

Default: false
--routingScope=Child|Root

The scope for the generated routing.

Default: Child

pipelink

ng generate pipe <name> [options] ng g pipe <name> [options]

Arguments

Argument Description
<name>

The name of the pipe.

Options

Option Description
--export=true|false

Specifies if declaring module exports the pipe.

Default: false
--flat=true|false

Flag to indicate if a dir is created.

Default: true
--lintFix=true|false

Specifies whether to apply lint fixes after generating the pipe.

Default: false
--module=module

Allows specification of the declaring module.

Aliases: -m
--project=project

The name of the project.
--skipImport=true|false

Allows for skipping the module import.

Default: false
--spec=true|false

Specifies if a spec file is generated.

Default: true

servicelink

ng generate service <name> [options] ng g service <name> [options]

Arguments

Argument Description
<name>

The name of the service.

Options

Option Description
--flat=true|false

Flag to indicate if a dir is created.

Default: true
--lintFix=true|false

Specifies whether to apply lint fixes after generating the pipe.

Default: false
--project=project

The name of the project.
--spec=true|false

Specifies if a spec file is generated.

Default: true

serviceWorkerlink

ng generate serviceWorker [options] ng g serviceWorker [options]

Options

Option Description
--configuration=configuration

The configuration to apply service worker to.

Default: production
--project=project

The name of the project.
--target=target

The target to apply service worker to.

Default: build

universallink

ng generate universal [options] ng g universal [options]

Options

Option Description

The name of the application directory.

Default: app
--appId=appId

The appId to use withServerTransition.

Default: serverApp
--clientProject=clientProject

Name of related client app.
--main=main

The name of the main entry-point file.

Default: main.server.ts
--rootModuleClassName=
rootModuleClassName

The name of the root module class.

Default: AppServerModule
--rootModuleFileName=
rootModuleFileName

The name of the root module file

Default: app.server.module.ts
--skipInstall=true|false

Skip installing dependency packages.

Default: false
--test=test

The name of the test entry-point file.
--testTsconfigFileName=
testTsconfigFileName

The name of the TypeScript configuration file for tests.

Default: tsconfig.spec
--tsconfigFileName=
tsconfigFileName

The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

Default: tsconfig.server
